definition: Tang emperor Xuanzong's 唐玄宗[Tang2 Xuan2 zong1] reign name used during the Kaiyuan era (713-741), a peak of Tang prosperity

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon

sentences.english: Kai Yuan Real Estate is full of life.
sentences.chinese: 开元地产厚积薄发，蓄势而上。

sentences.english: Parking is available on a first-come, first-served basis along tree-lined Kai Yuan Road.
sentences.chinese: 停车位是沿着开元路上，总是先到先得。

sentences.english: In the history of the tang dynasty was formed "kaiyuan time" boom.
sentences.chinese: 历史上的唐朝之所以形成“开元盛世”的繁荣景象。

sentences.english: There was a beautiful girl named Yang Yuhuan who was selected into the palace in Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 唐朝开元年间，有一美貌女子叫杨玉环，被选进宫来。

sentences.english: We are now at the Kaiyuan Holiday Resort by the side of Qiandao Lake.
sentences.chinese: 我们现在是在千岛湖开元度假村。

sentences.english: The Three-hundred Year Past of Dama Lanterns of Kai-Yuan …
sentences.chinese: 台南开元寺法灯录三百年史。

definition: Emperor Xianzong of Tang (778-820), reign name of twelfth Tang emperor Li Chun 李純|李纯[Li3 Chun2] reigned 805-820
Emperor Dezong of Tang (742-805), reign name of tenth Tang emperor Li Kuo 李适[Li3 Kuo4], reigned 779-805
the Tang dynasty (618-907)
Emperor Muzong of Tang (795-825), reign name of thirteenth Tang emperor 李恆|李恒[Li3 Heng2] reigned 821-825
Emperor Suzong of Tang (711-762), reign name of eighth Tang emperor Li Heng 李亨[Li3 Heng1], reigned 756-762
Emperor Taizong of Tang (727-779), reign name of ninth Tang emperor Li Yu 李豫[Li3 Yu4], reigned 762-779
Wenzong Emperor, reign name of Yuan Dynasty emperor Tugh Temür (1304-1332), reigned 1328-1332
sb whose calligraphy serves as a model
Tang dynasty (618-907)
Tang Emperor Xuanzong (685-762), also known as Emperor Ming of Tang 唐明皇[Tang2 Ming2 huang2], reign name of seventh Tang emperor 李隆基[Li3 Long1 ji1], reigned 712-756
Emperor Xuanzong of Tang (810-859), reign name of seventeenth Tang emperor Li Chen 李忱[Li3 Chen2], reigned 846-859
Emperor Gaozu of Tang, reign name of first Tang emperor Li Yuan 李淵|李渊[Li3 Yuan1] (566-635), reigned 618-626
Emperor Wenzong of Tang (809-840), reign name of fifteenth Tang emperor 李昂[Li3 Ang2], reigned 827-840
Jianwen Emperor, reign name of second Ming Emperor Zhu Yunwen 朱允炆[Zhu1 Yun3 wen2] (1377-1402), reigned 1398-1402
Emperor Ruizong of Tang, reign name of sixth Tang emperor Li Dan 李旦[Li3 Dan4] (662-716), reigned 684-690 and 710-712
reign name (196-219) at the end of the Han dynasty
Emperor Gaozong of Tang, reign name of third Tang emperor Li Zhi 李治[Li3 Zhi4] (628-683), reigned 649-683
